ack.title: ACKNOWLEDGMENTS
ack.p: We thank David Gaboriau for help with microscopy. We thank the St. Mary’s NHLI FACS core facility and Yanping Guo in particular for support, instrumentation, and help with single cell sorting.

E.S. was supported by an Imperial College President’s Scholarship; P.J.N., C.M.S., D.H.G., and W.S.B. were supported by Wellcome Trust grant 205100; B.M. was supported by a Wellcome Trust Studentship; T.P.P. was supported by Biotechnology and Biological Sciences Research Council (BBSRC) grant BB/R013071/1; J.S.L. and W.S.B. were supported by BBSRC grant BB/K002465/1. The Facility for Imaging by Light Microscopy (FILM) at Imperial College London is partially supported by funding from the Wellcome Trust (grant 104931/Z/14/Z) and BBSRC (grant BB/L015129/1).

E.S. designed the research, performed experiments, and analyzed data. P.J.N. and B.M. performed experiments and analyzed data. C.M.S., T.P.P., and D.H.G. analyzed data. W.S.B. and J.S.L. designed the research. E.S., C.M.S., and W.S.B. wrote the manuscript.
